page.title: 18OPINIONS ABOUT WALDERSLADE
page.content:
{WHAT DO PEOPLE HERE THINK ABOUT {WHERE THEY LIVE? _______ To find the answer to this question we interviewed people at Weedswood and Walderslade Village shops on 29 June and 4 July.We went with a partner and took it in turns to ask questions and record the answers.Eight of us went to each place and we interviewed ten people between the two of us.Each group of eight interviewed 40,so alto- gether we asked 80 people questions.
_______ Our first question was: {1. DO YOU LIVE IN WALDERLADE?....... Yes.....61 No......19 We asked those who said no,if they would like to live in Walderslade 16 out of 19 said they would.
